message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000. I believe it will be incredibly beneficial to you, and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective. While $10,000 is too low, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $17,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort, but I am still unable to meet you at $17,000. I would like to propose $14,000 as a counteroffer.
